title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 8, ch. V, subch. A, pt. 308 - Payment Of Salary Or Remuneration Or Unused Vacation Upon Resignation Or Retirement Or Upon Death While In Service
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 8, ch. V, subch. A, pt. 308 - Payment Of Salary Or Remuneration Or Unused Vacation Upon Resignation Or Retirement Or Upon Death While In Service

State Regulations
§ 308.1 - Application
§ 308.2 - Payment for unused vacation
§ 308.3 - Payment upon completion of required service

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 8, ch. V, subch. A, pt. 308

Statutory authority: Education Law, §355-a, subd. 8, par. i

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
